rules.title: Accurate Ingredient and Name Info
rules.description: Ingredients must appear in correct order, with established names, and no confusion or fanciful naming.

rules.title: Combination and Dosage Info
rules.description: Must list all active ingredients, dosage forms, and strengths clearly.

rules.title: Balanced Presentation
rules.description: Ads must present a true statement of side effects, contraindications, and effectiveness without misleading or incomplete information.
rules.key_term: misleading, omission, omits, risk, balance, benefit, format, font, image

rules.title: Side Effect References and Authority
rules.description: Each page must reference side effects, and disclaimers must not misrepresent authority or data as conclusive.
rules.key_term: side effects, adverse event, may cause
